document_data.mainbody:
orak Lightdrinker was a shield dwarf vampire in Undermountain in the early 1490s DR.
Around the Year of Three Ships Sailing, 1492 DR, Halaster Blackcloak captured Zorak and bound him to a crypt inside the Obstacle Course level. Halaster put the dwarf vampire under a geas that compelled him to hunt and kill all travelers that were marked with a death mark, which was gained entering into the crypt.
